LANDING_PAGE_ANNOUNCEMENT_TEXT: Revolutionizing the Way You Interact with Your Computer
LANDING_PAGE_SUB_HERO_TEXT: Design, customize, and create the ultimate computer mouse tailored to your needs and preferences. From ergonomics to functionality, take control of your input device like never before.
STARTER_TEMPLATE_HERO_SECONDARY_TITLE: Design, Customize, and Create Your Perfect Mouse
PAGE_DETAIL_1_VALUE: Our app guides you through the intricate process of mouse design, ensuring every curve and button is perfectly crafted.
PAGE_DETAIL_2_VALUE: Create mice that prioritize user comfort with our advanced ergonomic modeling tools and real-time feedback system.
PAGE_DETAIL_3_VALUE: From sensor sensitivity to programmable buttons, our app offers unparalleled customization options for your mouse designs.
FEATURE_1_BODY: Design your mouse with micron-level accuracy using our advanced 3D modeling tools.
FEATURE_2_BODY: Create the most comfortable mouse ever with our ergonomic analysis and optimization features.
FEATURE_3_BODY: Choose from a vast library of buttons, scroll wheels, and sensors to build your perfect mouse.
FEATURE_4_BODY: Simulate real-world usage and fine-tune your mouse design with our integrated testing environment.
FEATURE_5_BODY: Bring your vision to life with our expansive color palette and texture options for a stunning finish.
FEATURE_6_BODY: Export your designs in industry-standard formats, ready for prototyping or mass production.

SIGN_UP_COMPONENT_GOOGLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEX: Continue with Google for quick mouse-making
FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Everything you need to know about our mouse-making app
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: Our app is a comprehensive tool designed to help you create custom computer mice. It guides you through the process of designing, customizing, and ordering your perfect mouse.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_2: Can I customize the shape and size of my mouse?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: Absolutely! Our app offers a wide range of shape and size options to ensure your mouse fits your hand comfortably and suits your ergonomic needs.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_3: What kind of features can I add to my custom mouse?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: You can add various features such as programmable buttons, adjustable DPI settings, RGB lighting, wireless capabilities, and different sensor types to tailor your mouse to your specific needs.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_4: How long does it take to receive my custom-made mouse?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: Once you've finalized your design and placed an order, it typically takes 2-3 weeks for manufacturing and shipping. We'll keep you updated on the progress of your mouse throughout the process.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_5: Is there a warranty for the custom-made mice?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: Yes, all our custom-made mice come with a 1-year warranty covering manufacturing defects. We also offer an extended warranty option for additional peace of mind.
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: MouseMaker is an innovative app designed to help users create custom mouse cursors for their computers. It offers a wide range of tools and features to design unique, personalized mouse pointers.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_2: How do I create a custom mouse cursor?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: Creating a custom mouse cursor is easy with MouseMaker. Simply launch the app, choose from our templates or start from scratch, use our intuitive design tools to customize your cursor, and then export it for use on your computer.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: Can I use MouseMaker on different operating systems?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: Yes, MouseMaker is compatible with Windows, macOS, and Linux. You can create and use custom cursors on any of these platforms, making it versatile for all users.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_4: Are there any limitations on cursor designs?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: While MouseMaker offers extensive customization options, there are some technical limitations to ensure optimal performance. Cursors should be kept within reasonable size limits and follow system-specific guidelines for best results.

TESTIMONIAL_2_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: I never thought creating a custom mouse could be this easy. The app's features and user-friendly interface have made my job so much more efficient.
